resp = client.security.put_role_mapping(
    name="mapping2",
    roles=[
        "user",
        "admin"
    ],
    enabled=True,
    rules={
        "field": {
            "username": [
                "esadmin01",
                "esadmin02"
            ]
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
